title: Missing Stuff
body: I got soraka to level 5 then a S- at the same time same game 2/6/22 a support. I cant find the S- in the hextech crafting to level her up to level 6. U need 2 S or S- but I got a S- but I didn't get it!

replies.body:
You cannot receive a Champion Mastery Token in the same match that you hit mastery level 5. The message that pops up when you hit 5 mentions you *can now* start earning tokens. Once you earn (2) level 6 mastery tokens on Soraka, you'll be able to unlock level 6 mastery on her.

Check out our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5) for a good look at this system. Let me know if you have any other questions.
